Stage IVB      In stage IVB, cancer has spread to any of the following:               - The back of the eye.      - The brain.      - The middle parts of the skull.      - The nerves in the head that go to the brain.      - The upper part of the throat behind the nose.      - The base of the skull.              and cancer may be found in one or more lymph nodes of any size, anywhere in the neck.      or      Cancer is found in a lymph node larger than 6 c
